channel.title: about on werk.statt.codes
channel.description: Recent content in about on werk.statt.codes

item.title: About
item.description: About Not that the world would have been waiting for another blog… but there you go. This blog is a collection of my ‘thoughts in R’ with varying degrees of seriousness. Posts will mostly relate to my substantive interests (comparative political science, human rights) or are simply notes to myself on a specific R function. Aiming at but not claiming any final truth. Codes are collected at www.github.com/zoowalk Tweets are at @zoowalk.
